1.SceneDescription: Central Perk. All except Chandler, plus Emma.

lines.Line:
Oh hey you guys, I couldn't get a reservation for the night
of my birthday, so we have to do dinner Thursday night instead
So, so, is Mike coming to dinner

No! It's my first birthday with a boyfriend, and he has to
work. Uch, I get mad at him, but I think it's a little to soon to
show my true colors

Pheebs, I would make a reservation for five, because one of
us has to stay home and watch Emma. (to Ross:) Which one of us should
go to dinner
Actually, um, I was thinking maybe both of us could go
Thanks, I put a lot of extra thoughts on your gift

Alright, okay, so we can all go now. That is fun. Hey, you
know what? We all haven't been together the six of us in such a long
time
What are you talking about? We're all together right now

2.SceneDescription:
The Bings'. Monica in bathrobe, merely covered. Someone'S
knocking at the door.

lines.Line:
(from outside) Trick or treat! (It's obviously Halloween eve,
the night of her birthday dinner.
Ooh, and treat it is. (Monica's breasts.

Wow, so glad I changed. Almost weared my ??? outfit that
can't contain my breasts

This is not, what I'm wearing. I'm ovulating and Chandler's
gonna be home any minute, so I thought we would try before dinner

Ohh. Oh wait! (Jis) you guys won't be late for my dinner,
will you

Believe me, Chandler and I have not seen each other in over a
week. We'll probably be the first ones there

'kay, see you there. Happy humping! (outside meeting
Chandler.) Hey...hey! Oh, wow, somebody smoked out here? Oh my god,
don't people know, you're not allowed to smoke in public spaces

Actually, in Oklahoma smoking is legal in all commune areas
and offices with fewer than fifteen people

No! I just happened t'do a lot trivias about smoking in
different states. For example, in Hawaii cigarettes are called
Leyhallalookoos
(smells at him) Chandler, you stink of cigarettes
Uch, do you think, Monica is gonna be able smell it

Are you kidding? The woman has the nose of a bloodhound ...
and the breasts of a great goddess

(getting in) Okay, something to cover the smell ... Oven
cleaner! (sprays himself, reads label) Unscented

(naughty in doorway) Welcome home. I've missed you. join me
in the bedroom
(comes over) O-kay, so you wanna play it that way, do you

(shrinks back) Right. You know what? Actually I just get
off the plane, so I'm feeling kinda gross. Maybe I should just take a
shower

(still backs away) Alright, the truth is, I soiled myself
during some turbulences

What do I smell? (sniffs him) I smell smoke. Huh--did you
smoke

Yes, but I just had one. Two. Two tiny cigarettes. Okay,
five. A pack. Two pack...a...a carton. Three big fat cartons in two
days. (How many cigs are there in one pack and how many packs in one
carton in the US?) But it's over, I made a decision, I'm not gonna
smoke anymore
(gets a pack out of his jacket
(gets a pack out of his jacket

3.SceneDescription:
The restaurant. Phoebe and Joey are sitting alone at a table
for six.

lines.Line: Where is everyone? They're forty minutes late

I'm starving. I know we were coming here tonight, I ate
nothing all day
What about me, he? Only had one lunch today

(with British accent) Soo, are we expecting the rest of our
party shortly

Yes, they are expected presently. Yeah, yeah um, their
arrival is in the offing

Right. We do have a table for two available, perhaps you
would be more comfortable
No, they're comin', we're waitin' right here
No, they're comin', we're waitin' right here
Joseph! (to waiter) Thou needn't worry, they shan't be long
It's just that we do have some large parties waiting
One really does have a stick up one's ass. Doesn't one
Okay, well the ??? is not home

Oh-oh, wait, my mother is gonna be here any minute. And she has
the keys

Alright, I can't, I can't wait that long. You have to do
something--knock that door down

I would, but I bruise like a peach. Besides, y...you know,
everything is gonna be fine. The baby's sleeping
What if she jumped out the basinet
What if she jumped out the basinet
Can't hold her own head up, but yeah jumped
Oh my god, I left the water running

Rach you did not leave the water running. Please, just pull
yourself together, okay
Ah, did I leave the stove on
Ah, did I leave the stove on

You never cooked since 1996. (Actually Rachel cooked in "609 -
TOW Ross Got High", first aired 1999-11-25.

Is the window open? Because if there's a window open, a bird
could fly in there

Oh my god, you know what, yeah, I think you're right. I think
.. listen, listen

A pigeon, a pigeon. (previously scared Rachel turns away) No,
no wait, no-no, an eagle flew in. Landed on the stove and caught
fire. The baby, seeing this, jumps across the apartment to the mighty
bird's aid. The eagle, however, misconstrues as an act of aggression
and grabs the baby on its talon. Meanwhile the faucet fills the
apartment with water. Baby and bird still up lays (?) are locked in a
death grip, swirling around the whirl pool, that fills the apartment
Boy, are you gonna be sorry if that's true

5.SceneDescription:
The Bings' bedroom, Chandler is undressing, Monica in bed

lines.Line: Spend more time with the tie. That'll make a baby

Look, I can't do this. I can't make luv to you while we're
fighting this way

Oh sure, now you're Mister Sensitivity. But when you wanted
to have sex right after my uncle's funera

That was a celebration of life. Alright, look, I'm not
gonna do this. Alright, is this really the way you want a baby to be
conceived

No, you're right. Mnya, we shouldn't do it like this. Huch.
For what it's worth, I'm, I'm sorry. I shouldn't have come down on
you so hard about the smoking. So you had a few cigarettes, not the
end of the world

You are incredible. Unless, I...I'm not gonna smoke again.
And if I do, I promise, I will hide it so much better from you. (they
kiss
You know what? Let's not talk
Uch. I am still so mad at you for smoking

But you said you forgave me. It was just a couple of
cigarettes--no big deal

I was just saying that because I was ovulating and you said
you wouldn't have sex with me while we're fighting
You tricked me to get me into bed
Excellent. The shrew in particular was exclusive
Well, I hope, you got some room left

(with birthday cake, singing) Happy birthday to you, happy
birthday to you, happy birthday dear ..
